title: Week 6 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Miracles & Nightmares - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/12
description:
Week 6 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 6 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Plus, players to consider dropping for each position, injury updates, and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 12th, 2021.
  
 (04:25) - Monday Night Recap: Colts vs Ravens
 (12:00) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (24:55) - NFL News
 (33:40) - Week 6 Waivers
 (33:50) - WR Waivers
 (48:00) - RB Waivers
 (59:45) - TE Waivers
 (01:02:35) - DST Streamers
 (01:03:15) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube

 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
